light.--theme-btn-shadow: inset rgba(50, 50, 93, 0.25) 0px 2px 5px -1px, inset rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3) 0px 1px 3px -1px, inset rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8) 0px 1px 1px -1px

dark.--theme-btn-shadow: inset rgb(50, 50, 93) 0px 3px 5px -1px, inset rgb(0, 0, 0) 1px 2px 3px -1px, inset rgb(0, 0, 0) 0px 1px 1px -1px
dark.--card-shadow: 0.5px 0.3px 0.8px hsl(var(--color-secondary-shadow) / 0.19),4.3px 2.1px 6.2px -0.2px hsl(var(--color-secondary-shadow) / 0.23),7.9px 4px 11.4px -0.5px hsl(var(--color-secondary-shadow) / 0.28),12.8px 6.4px 18.5px -0.7px hsl(var(--color-secondary-shadow) / 0.32),20.2px 10.1px 29.1px -0.9px hsl(var(--color-secondary-shadow) / 0.36),31.4px 15.7px 45.3px -1.2px hsl(var(--color-secondary-shadow) / 0.4),47.7px 23.8px 68.8px -1.4px hsl(var(--color-secondary-shadow) / 0.45)
